snippets.heading: EOSEVM Open Sourced - 27 Apr 2023
snippets.content: The #EOS EVM source code has officially been open sourced! 📣  This is an important milestone for the EVM, keeping with the #ENF's core values of open collaboration and transparency 🔍  EOS EVM GitHub: https://github.com/eosnetworkfoundation/eos-evm (https://github.com/eosnetworkfoundation/eos-evm/)

snippets.heading: EOSEVM - 'no bugs'
snippets.content: 'We've audited so many EVMs in our time & this the first EVM we've ever audited where we've found no bugs' 🗣 Charles Holtzkampf of Sentnl.io - ' The #EOS EVM is so robust that even the number one bug bounty hunter on Ethereum couldn't find any vulnerabilities' 💪

snippets.heading: IBC & #EVM
snippets.content: The most notable impact of open sourcing the $EOS EVM is enabling all @AntelopeIO chains to also launch their own EVM as well. With the recent release of IBC, this is important to ensuring cross chain compatibility & feature parity. More on IBC: https://eosnetwork.com/ibc-using-eos/

snippets.heading: EOS_Contact
snippets.content: I believe it would be the best to contact ENF in terms of these type of topics through their contact form that is available on their webpage: https://eosnetwork.com/contact/

snippets.heading: Hackathon Upland - Registration still open!
snippets.content: 'The contest ultimately ending at Upland's Genesis Week celebration in Las Vegas on June 9. Registration deadline on May 12 and submission deadline on May 26. After the finalists are selected for all three tracks, they will deliver a presentation to judges and players in Las Vegas on June 9.' - https://www.upland.me/events/hackathon-your-way-to-10k-and-2-million-upx

snippets.heading: EOSEVM miner.enf
snippets.content: The miner.enf is the CPU cost for mining the transaction as the RPC provider and the eosio.evm table balance is the gas revenue from the EVM transactions that is being set aside for a future burn. The other accounts in the table are from end users who opened balances to hold dust due to the the differences in token precision between EVM and native. - https://eosnetwork.com/blog/eos-evm-tokenomics-deep-dive/

snippets.heading: Leap_4 Released - 25 Apr 2023
snippets.content: Today, ENF is excited announce the release of Antelope Leap v4.0.0 🦌 This enables features such as: 🏎 Higher Performance w/Multi-Threading  📊 Reduced Latency & Faster Block Propagation  🔎 More Control & Visibility Around State & History Data- 📣 Announcement - https://eosnetwork.com/blog/antelope-leap-4-released

snippets.heading: EOS_Testnet faucet
snippets.content: EOS Testnet Faucet: faucet.testnet.evm.eosnetwork.com (http://faucet.testnet.evm.eosnetwork.com/) Please consider joining the Developer Group to stay updated.: https://t.me/eosevm

snippets.heading: Consensus2023 Highlights
snippets.content: The ENF & EOS community attended Consensus 2023 last week to spread the word about #TheNewEOS 📺 Watch Highlights Video: - You Tube -6m- : https://youtu.be/TcBqlRCpcZo

snippets.heading: Upland detailed
snippets.content: Upland Co-Founder, Idan Zuckerman, goes into detail in a recent interview with the ENF's Communications team, Zack Gall & Brandon Lovejoy 🎙  ✨ Highlight - https://youtube.com/shorts/7eQfPEoDH-Y  📺 Full Episode - https://youtu.be/aBLnLMkqzZk

snippets.heading: BBS decentralized social media
snippets.content: During #Consensus2023 the #ENF was able to connect with Eyal Hertzog, co-founder of Bancor and founder of BBS Network 🌐 BBS is revolutionizing social media with their decentralized messaging platform. - You Tube -6m- : 📺 https://youtu.be/P7lS9M7B1GA 📺

snippets.heading: EOS_Fireside_Chat_Clips - Hong Kong & Web 3
snippets.content: Recently on the EOS Fireside Chat, ENF CEO, Yves La Rose, provided insight into the growing blockchain industry in Hong Kong and the opportunities this presents for EOS ...  🔥 Watch Highlight: https://youtu.be/9aNJlhBL4Bs

snippets.heading: EOS_Fireside_Chat - 03 May 2023
snippets.content: 'Every Wednesday 19:00 UTC : 'On the agenda: 🎉 Consensus 2023 Recap 🌐 EOS EVM Open Sourced 🏗 Bart Wyatt Featured on Architects of Consensus 🚀 ZEOS Updates & Developments 📰 Cointelegraph Magazine Feature: EOS' Grassroots Comeback 📊 ENF Quarterly Report 🎤 Community Open Mic 💬 Off-Topic Banter - Special guests: 🤓 Bart Wyatt, ENF CTO 🤝 Yves La Rose, ENF Founder & CEO ❤️ EOS Community (you!)' - You Tube -2hr21m- : https://www.youtube.com/live/zquQssJQWy4?feature=share
